CHAT.comment: TIMOTHY BOOTH, Petitioner v. C. O. CHURNER, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:15 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF NANCY WINKELMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GERALD J. PAPPERT ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF IRVING L. GORNSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF NANCY WINKELMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:11 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
